title: Hamath
content: An important city of Syria, in the valley of the Orontes; the “entering in of Hamath” was the northern limit of the Promised Land (
). Toi, king of Hamath, was on friendly terms with David (
). The city seems to have come under the dominion of Solomon (
). It was afterwards taken by the Assyrians (
). It is still a town of considerable importance.
